title: Man Utd 'express interest in Mexican star Francisco Sebastian Cordova'
text:
Manchester United are reportedly weighing up a move for Mexican youngster Francisco Sebastian Cordova.

The 22-year-old midfielder won his first senior international cap earlier this year and is fast attracting attention from some of the major European leagues.

United are not the only side to express an interest in Cordova with Sevilla also chasing him.

Manchester and Sevilla are both reportedly interested in Mexico star Francisco Cordova

While reports in Portugal are claiming that Benfica are also ready to enter the race for Cordova.

The Mexico international has netted three goals in his last seven appearances for Club America and is believed to be valued in the region of £4million.

Cordova, who helped his club win last season's Liga MX Apertura and the Clausura 2019 in the Copa MX, is widely regarded as one of the brightest prospects in Mexico.
description: The 22-year-old midfielder won his first senior international cap earlier this year and is fast attracting attention from some of the major European leagues.
